replies.body: Still prefer the getting the sale when a skin is released.

{{champion:84}} i wish an akali skin can go for sale like honestly havent seen one on sale so far :((

Headhunter Akali went on sale a couple of weeks ago: http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/champion-and-skin-sale-1304-1604

Keep an eye out for sale annoucnements like these to make sure you don't miss out next time:
April - http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/april-sales-schedule
May - http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/may-sales-schedule
I wish they would make more ekko skins. just for the ekko mains out there pls.{{champion:245}}
yess please bring out some more skins

Dear Riot,

Welcome to OCE, the place where good is not good enough, I want URF in bots like it used to be. I like being able to spam abilities without the thought of people being able to kill me. So if you could do that next time URF comes out that would be much appreciated.

Regards,

Samuel(Gispry)
